content: The White Seashell Waist Chain is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'White_Seashell_Waist_Chain.md', within the main section titled 'White Seashell Waist Chain'.
The content is as follows:
The White Seashell Waist Chain is one of the many Curios items you can find in Black Myth: Wukong. Like the rest of these items, once found, it can be equipped from the Equipment menu.
